body_html:
@heroleap
I think I am having the exact same problem as yours, and my approach is also similar to yours. BTW, I am now using 40Gb network, I do notice some performance increase compare to 1G (improve from 10 times slower to maybe 4 times slower), and my network usage is only about 10% I believe. There could be a lot of different reasons to cause this slowness. It's good if we can do some joint experiment and figure this out together?

body:
@heroleap 
I think I am having the exact same problem as yours, and my approach is also similar to yours. BTW, I am now using 40Gb network, I do notice some performance increase compare to 1G (improve from 10 times slower to maybe 4 times slower), and my network usage is only about 10% I believe. There could be a lot of different reasons to cause this slowness. It's good if we can do some joint experiment and figure this out together?
